Greetings to Hungarian President
    Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People' Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Hungarian President Ferenc Madl on August 20 on the occasion of the national day of the Republic of Hungary.
 Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms, the message wished him greater success in his work.
